rpaleoclim 1.0.1.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

rpaleoclim (development version)

  • Failed downloads (e.g. due to server errors) now return NA and a warning, instead of causing an error
  • ‘Getting started’ vignette is now precompiled so that building the package does generate a request to the Paleoclim data server (#20)

rpaleoclim 1.0.1

CRAN release: 2023-08-09

  • Removed suggested dependency on rgdal (#18)
    • raster (>= 3.5.1) now uses terra (>= 1.5-12) for linking to GDAL
    • rgdal is retired and will be removed from CRAN in October 2023: https://r-spatial.org/r/2022/04/12/evolution.html

rpaleoclim 1.0.0

CRAN release: 2023-04-28

  • Added an introductory vignette
  • Migrated from terra to raster:
    • paleoclim() and load_paleoclim() now return a terra::SpatRaster instead of a raster::raster.
    • paleoclim(as = "raster") and load_paleoclim(as = "raster") are provided for backwards compatibility. These require raster to be installed and will be removed in future versions.
    • The region argument of paleoclim() now expects a terra::ext instead of a raster::extent. extent is coercible to ext, so this shouldn’t break any existing code.
  • Fixed name of period "mis19" (was "mis")

rpaleoclim 0.9

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
